wordpressPage.title: The Big Quiz 2
wordpressPage.content:
This resource is the first of our ‘Big Quizzes’. This quiz has been tried and tested with young people and has 5 rounds.

Items Needed: Some music from your iPod (or iTunes if the cheese factor on your iPod is too high). You’ll also need the ‘Close Up’ images which can be downloaded here: Keynote (Mac) | PDF | PowerPoint

Click here to download the quiz questions and answers

Included: Music round, general knowledge, ‘Getting to know the other team’ round, Close up round and General Knowledge round
